item.title: Waymo responds to Tesla’s dick joke with a bigger Austin robotaxi map
item.description: Earlier this week, Elon Musk posted an image of Tesla’s robotaxi service area in Austin, Texas, that was in the shape of a penis. Hilarious, I know, but more importantly: it appeared that Tesla’s map
